title: Game Scoop Episode 611
description: Welcome back to Game Scoop!, IGN's weekly video game talk show. This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are talking Hitman III and the very Daemie game Cyber Shadow. There's also strange news on the next Tomb Raider game and Daemon has a few theories about Godzilla vs. Kong. The opening jingle is from Gain Ground on the Sega Genesis.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
